meanings.definition: A tax or payment made in lieu of military service.
meanings.sent1: The scutage was a fee paid instead of joining the army.
meanings.sent2: The king collected scutage from his subjects to fund the war.
meanings.sent3: The scutage was like a ticket to skip military duty.
meanings.sent4: Paying scutage was akin to hiring someone else to fight in your place.
meanings.sent5: The scutage was a shield of gold against the sword of war.

meanings.sent1: He scutaged his way out of serving in the army.
meanings.sent2: The nobleman scutages his obligations to the king.
meanings.sent3: She scutages her duty with a bag of coins.
meanings.sent4: Scutaging was his method of avoiding battle.
meanings.sent5: They scutage as if buying peace with gold.
